law.catch_line: Inspection and closing of mines by department -- Hearings.

text.section: The operator, superintendent, or mine manager of every mine shall furnish the mine inspector proper facilities for entering the mine and making examinations or obtaining information.

In all emergency hearings, a departmental attorney, the Attorney General, the Commonwealth's attorney, or the county attorney of the judicial circuit or county in which the mine is situated shall appear for the Commonwealth and defend the action.
